question: Will more than 2.4 million people travel through a TSA checkpoint on any day on or before May 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether more than 2.4 million people will travel through a TSA checkpoint on any single day on or after March 29, 2022, and on or before May 1, 2022. 

The resolution source for this market will be the daily checkpoint throughput as measured by the US Transportation Security Administration (TSA), https://www.tsa.gov/coronavirus/passenger-throughput. Should this URL change or move locations a new URL on the tsa.gov domain will remain valid to resolve this market. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the TSA reports a daily checkpoint throughput of more than 2,400,000 for any day on or after March 29, 2022, and on or before May 1, 2022. This market will resolve to “No” otherwise. 

This market will resolve as soon as throughput data becomes available for the date of May 1, 2022, or on any date before that if the target is reached. If the target has not been reached and if data is not available for any of the days from March 29, 2022, to May 1, 2022, by May 10, 2022, the market will resolve to 50-50.  Any revisions published to data for dates March 29, 2022 and onward prior to the release of data for May 1, 2022, will be considered.

question: Will the total value locked (TVL) in DeFi be $85 billion or higher on April 17?
description:
This is a market on the total USD value locked in "Decentralized Finance" on April 17, 2022.

If the Total Value Locked (USD) on April 17, 2022, 12:00 PM ET is $85.000B or greater this market resolves to "Yes". Otherwise, this market resolves to "No".

The resolution source will be the TVL (USD) value calculated by Defi Pulse and in the box named "Total Value Locked (USD)", available here: http://defipulse.com. 

If the data in the box is unavailable on April 17, 2022, 12:00 PM ET - the resolution source will be checked every 6 hours until the data in the box in available.
If data in the box is not available by April 24, 12 PM ET, the chart value for April 17, 2022, will be used instead, and if that is not available as well, the market will resolve to 50/50. 


---------
Total value locked (TVL), in the context of cryptocurrency, represents the sum of all assets deposited in DeFi protocols earning rewards, interest, new coins and tokens, fixed income, etc. 

DeFi is an abbreviation of the phrase decentralized finance which generally refers to digital assets and financial smart contracts, protocols, and decentralized applications (DApps).

Resolution Source: http://defipulse.com

question: FIDE World Chess Grand Prix 2022: Will Hikaru Nakamura win Leg #3?
description:
The FIDE Grand Prix 2022 is a series of three chess tournaments and the final qualifier for the Candidates Tournament, played between March 22 and April 4, 2022 in Berlin, Germany and Belgrade, Serbia.  The top two finishers will qualify for the Candidates Tournament 2022, which is the final qualification stage for the World Chess Championship 2023. It’s organized by World Chess. 24 of the world’s top players take part in the Series.

This market is about the winner of the FIDE Grand Prix 2022 Tournament Leg #3, in Berlin Germany from March 22nd 2022 to April 4th 2022.

This market will resolve to "Yes", if Hikaru Nakamura wins first place in Leg #3, and to "No" otherwise.

If for any reason the winner of the Leg #3 tournament is not decided by April 11th (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Tiger Woods play in the 2022 US Masters Tournament?
description:
Professional golfer Tiger Woods was injured badly in a car crash in Los Angeles, CA on February 23, 2021. Since then there has been much speculation on whether he will participate in major tournaments moving forward.

This market asks whether Tiger Woods will play in the 2022 US Masters Tournament - the 86th edition of the Masters Tournament and the first of the four major men's golf championships held in 2022. It is scheduled to be played from April 7–10, 2022 at the Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia.

If Tiger Woods plays in the 2022 US Masters Tournament, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution sources will be official information from the Masters Tournament (e.g.https://www.masters.com/en_US/players/player_list.html, https://www.masters.com/en_US/players/player_8793.html?promo=bio_players) or the Augusta National Golf Club, however other credible reporting may be used.

If the 2022 Masters Tournament is cancelled altogether, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: GRAMMYs 2022: Will Lady Gaga's and Tony Bennet's "I Get a Kick Out of You" win Record of the Year?
description:
The 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, presented by the Recording Academy, is an event honoring “outstanding achievement in the music industry” for the period of time between September 30, 2020, and September 30, 2021. It is scheduled to take place at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas on April 3, 2022. The nominations were announced on November 23, 2021.

This is a market on whether “I Get a Kick Out of You” by Lady Gaga and Tony Bennet will win the Grammy for Record of the Year at the 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, scheduled to take place on April 3, 2022. 

If “I Get a Kick Out of You” by Lady Gaga and Tony Bennet wins the Grammy for Record of the Year at the 64th GRAMMYs Awards Show, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If for any reason the winner is not announced by May 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50. The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards and the Grammy website (https://www.grammy.com/), however other credible reporting may be used.

question: 2022 Hungarian elections: Will Fidesz win at least 113 parliamentary seats?
description:
This market asks whether the current majority party of the Hungarian National Assembly (the Hungarian Parliament), Fidesz - Hungarian Civic Alliance (in Hungarian: Fidesz – Magyar Polgári Szövetség), will win at least 113 seats in the upcoming 2022 Hungarian National Assembly election scheduled to take place on April 3, 2022.

If Fidesz wins 113 or more seats in the Hungarian National Assembly in the 2022 Hungarian National Assembly election, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official election results released by the Government of Hungary (e.g. https://www.valasztas.hu/web/national-election-office), however other credible reporting may be considered.

If this election and/or the results of this election are delayed this market's settlement may be delayed until June 3, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, after which, if no results can be obtained, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the price of wheat close above $1050 on April 29, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the price of a "wheat unit" will be above $1050.00 on market close on April 29, 2022. 

If the price of a "wheat unit" is above $1050.00 on market close on this market's resolution date, April 29, 2022, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be Yahoo Finance’s reporting of the values offered by the Chicago SRW Wheat Futures, found at (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/ZW%3DF/history). Resolution will be based on the value listed in column labelled “Close*” under the resolution date. If the resolution source is unavailable on market close on April 29, 2022, another credible source (such as https://www.cmegroup.com/markets/agriculture/grains/wheat.html) will be used.

question: Will the Progressive Conservative Party win a majority in the 2022 Ontario General Election?
description:
This is a market on whether the Progressive Conservative Party of Ontario will win a majority of parliamentary seats during the Ontario General Election scheduled to be held on June 2, 2022. 

If the Progressive Conservative Party of Ontario wins a majority of seats, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a majority of parliamentary seats for the Province of Ontario is defined as "any number of seats greater than or equal to 63".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official election results released by the Government of Ontario (e.g. https://www.elections.on.ca/en.html, https://www.ola.org/en), however other credible reporting may be considered.

If this election and/or the results of this election are delayed this market's settlement may be delayed until August 2, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, after which, if no results can be obtained, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Joe Biden's FiveThirtyEight approval rating be 41.5% or higher on April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Joe Biden's approval rating as reported by FiveThirtyEight will be greater than or equal to 41.5% for the day of April 30, 2022. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source will be FiveThirtyEight's approval rating poll aggregator, https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/biden-approval-rating/, specifically the approval rating indicated by the green trend line for the resolution date. Changes in the methodology by which FiveThirtyEight calculates the approval rating will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The resolution data for April 30 will be checked on May 1, 2022 (12 PM ET). 

If for any reason it is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 24 hours until the approval rating for the resolution date is available. If the approval rating remains unavailable on the resolution source after 7 days or Joe Biden is not President on the resolution date, this market will resolve according to the available approval rating nearest to the resolution date. 

Please note, the resolution source reports the rating value to only one decimal point (e.g. 42.8%, 33.9%, etc). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market.

question: Will 'Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore' get a 80% or higher Tomatometer Score?
description:
This market will resolve to 'Yes' if, as checked on the resolution date, the 'Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore' movie will be given 80% or higher Tomatometer rating at Rotten Tomatoes, and 'No' otherwise.

The resolution source (Tomatometer All Critics Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/fantastic_beasts_the_secrets_of_dumbledore) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - April 19 2022 at 12:00 PM ET.

---------------

'Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore' will be released worldwide in theaters on April 15.

Rotten Tomatoes' Tomatometer is the percentage of all Approved Tomatometer Critics who have given this movie a positive review.

---------------

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 12 hours, until the actual data is available.

If the data is not available on the resolution source by April 26 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.
